com.inqwell.any

Interface DomainAgent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Any, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullDomainAgent, RemoteDomainAgent

    public interface DomainAgent
extends Any

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commit(Transaction t)
      Commit the given transaction on the host represented by this DomainAgent.

      Returns the host that this DomainAgent will reach.
      Process getLockMandate(Process p, Any a, long timeout)
      Performs any processing that must be completed prior to a lock request progressing.
      void release(Process p, Any a)
      Inform this DomainAgent that the existing lock on a held by process p is being released.

      • commit

        void commit(Transaction t)
     throws AnyException

        Throws:
        AnyException

      • getLockMandate

        Process getLockMandate(Process p,
                       Any a,
                       long timeout)
                throws AnyException
        Performs any processing that must be completed prior to a lock request progressing. Note that implementations should not run the timeout, which is supplied for use by the lock engine(s) in the domain represented by this DomainAgent.
        Parameters:
        p - the process performing the lock
        a - the object to be locked
        timeout - the period we are willing to wait for the lock the mandate.
        Returns:
        p if the lock request can proceed for process p, a representation of the locking process if the request cannot proceed at this time.
        Throws:
        ContainedException - wrapping InterruptedException
        AnyException

      • release

        void release(Process p,
             Any a)
        Inform this DomainAgent that the existing lock on a held by process p is being released.
